name: Potstickers and Stir-Fry Veggies
ingredients: 1 pack Trader Joe's frozen stir-fry veggies
directions: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a skillet. Place frozen potstickers in pan and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and water. Immediately cover pan and let steam 5 minutes, or until water has evaporated.
Add sauce and toss until combined.

name: Box Chili and Cornbread
directions: Follow directions on chili and cornbread boxes, with some of these helpful hints:
Preheat oven. Turn on skillet for chili. While oven is preheating, mix up cornbread in a bowl and pour into muffin pan.
Start browning meat as soon as muffin mix is in the pan.

name: PF Chang's and Rice
directions: Follow directions on instant rice box and PF Chang's bag.

name: Lasagna and Garlic Bread
directions: Follow instructions on the packages.

name: Garlic Lover's Spaghetti
ingredients: pinch of salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes
directions: Cook pasta according to instructions on box
While pasta water is heating, melt butter in a large saute pan over medium heat. Add the garlic and saute for 4-6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it is fragrant and starts to brown
Slowly add in the white wine, Italian seasoning, salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 5-10 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked and ready to go.
Once the pasta is cooked and drained, return it to the pot it was cooked in and add garlic-butter mixture. Toss until combined.

name: Easy Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: One 28oz can Old El Paso enchilada sauce
directions: Pour thin layer of sauce on bottom of baking dish
If not using soft corn tortillas, heat frying pan with oil and cook corn tortilla until soft
Fill with chicken and cheese and roll up
Put into baking dish
Pour sauce all over and sprinkle cheese on top
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 minutes

name: Burgers and Fries
ingredients: optional ingredients can include lettuce, bacon, tomato, onions, pickles, avocado, and more
directions: Cook fries according to directions on the bag
Cook burgers on medium high heat (electric grill) for 7 minutes per side
toast buns and cook bacon when the burger patties and fries are almost done cooking

name: Pizza
directions: Cook pizza according to directions on the package

name: One Pot Lemon Herb Chicken and Rice
ingredients: 1 cup uncooked white or brown rice
directions: Melt butter over medium heat in a large skillet or pan. Season chicken with salt and pepper to taste, and Italian seasoning. Brown chicken in butter for 1-2 minutes each side. Transfer chicken to a plate.
Add rice, chicken broth, lemon juice, and remaining Italian seasoning to the pan. Place chicken on top, then cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 20-25 minutes until liquid is dissolved.
Garnish with fresh parsley or cilantro if desired and lemon wedges for squeezing. Sriracha goes well on this dish, as it does on most things.

name: Lemon Garlic Herb Crusted Salmon
ingredients: Side ideas: green beans, risotto, frozen TJs potato side
directions: Place all ingredients except for salmon in a small bowl and microwave for 30-45 seconds
Stir until combined
Place salmon fillets on a parchment-lined baking sheet
Coat salmon evenly with lemon herb butter
Bake for 22 minutes at 375 degrees

name: BBQ Chicken and Roasted Veggie Quinoa
directions: Preheat grill to medium high heat
Cook batch of quinoa according to package instructions and set aside
Place veggies in a bowl. Add oil and seasonings. Toss to coat
Evenly spread veggies on a large baking tray lined with parchment paper
Roast veggies in the oven for 35-40 minutes
While veggies are roasting, put bbq sauce on the chicken and grill for 5-6 minutes per side
When veggies are done, mix them together with the quinoa
Optional: cut up chicken and mix with veggies and quinoa
Optional: season with red pepper flakes

name: Chicken Ramen Stir Fry
directions: Cook the ramen according to package instructions. Reserve 1 cup of water from the pot.
Combine the sauce ingredients in a small bowl. Whisk well.
Cook the chicken. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat before adding sliced chicken. Season with pepper and cook until browned.
Add sliced bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes before adding garlic and cooking until aromatic. Stir in shredded cabbage and cook until wilted and browned, typically another 2 minutes.

Add in ramen noodles and prepared sauce. You can pour in some of the water set aside from the noodles to make sure sauce combines well. Add green onion, cook for one more minute, and top with sesame seeds.

name: Grilled Chicken Street Tacos
ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs trimmed boneless skinless chicken thighs
serving options include avocado/guacamole, cotija cheese, lime wedges, chopped cilantro, 1 small red or yellow onion, avocado crema (see avocado crema recipe)
directions: Add chicken to a gallon size bag. Whisk together lime juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, chili powder, cilantro, 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp pepper
Pour mixture in the bag and let marinate at least 1 hour, or overnight
Grill chicken over medium high heat (425-450 degrees), 6 minutes per side
Dice chicken into cubes and serve with any of the options above

name: Avocado Crema (for tacos)
directions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth
Season to taste with more salt and/or pepper. Add more water to thin it out if desired

name: Stuffed Chicken Breast With Creamy Spinach
ingredients: 5 oz Greek cream cheese or goat cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 410 degrees
In a bowl, mix together all ingredients except chicken
Place a few tablespoons of the spinach mixture on a chicken breast and roll the chicken breast around it. Spray top of chicken breast with cooking spray. Optionally, sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Bake for 22-25 minutes, and broil for the last 2 minutes to help brown the top of the chicken
